fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 114.80 points or 0.59% to settle at 19,428.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.07% to 11.52. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
